attributes.action: Recind the legislation requiring the inspection of a private dwelling by councils prior to sale
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has introduced legislation making it a legal requirement for anyone wishing to sell a property to pay their local council £200 for a certificate of inspection prior to placing the house on the market. This is clearly a breach of modern human rights and ancient traditional british rights and should be recinded forwith
